Tutorial.description: What is and how to use Battle Mode

Start.Content: Welcome to the Battle Mode Tutorial

StateA.Content:
Battle Mode is a sub-mode for StarMade as a simple test for future modes.
It essentially turns the game into a arcade fighter.

StateB.Content:
In StarMade, building and gathering resources takes time,
Battle Mode lets people duel in a death match or team battle without having to worry about the rest.

StateC.Content: Admins can enable Battle Mode by editing the server.cfg file. If the "Use_Personal_Sectors" option is set to 'true', each player will have its own sector he cannot leave, but he will be provided with an infinite shop that never runs out of supplies nor requires credits to use, allowing you to build a PVP ship.

StateD.Content: To battle, the players have to join a specific faction: Team factions or the FFA faction.

StateE.Content:
The game will decide between FFA or Team Deathmatch by looking at the player count in each faction. The mode with the most players will be chosen.
Press '$LEADERBOARD' to see the Battle Mode leaderboard.

End.Content: This concludes the Battle Mode Tutorial. Thanks for reading, and thanks for playing StarMade!
